## Available Images in /img/

You can use any of these existing images:
- `/img/alignment_marks.png` - Alignment marks for layer registration
- `/img/cover_euv.png` - EUV lithography cover image
- `/img/energy_consumption_infographic.png` - Energy usage visualization
- `/img/euv_light_source_real.png` - Real EUV light source
- `/img/high_na_euv_render.png` - High-NA EUV system render
- `/img/multilayer_mirror_sem.png` - SEM image of multilayer mirrors
- `/img/photomask_closeup.png` - Close-up of photomask features
- `/img/projection_optics_render.png` - Projection optics system
- `/img/resist_ler_examples.png` - Line edge roughness examples
- `/img/resist_molecules_micrograph.png` - Resist molecules at molecular level
- `/img/throughput_chips_day_infographic.png` - Throughput metrics
- `/img/twinscan_machine_photo.png` - EUV scanner machine
- `/img/wafer_fab_bay_photo.png` - Fab cleanroom environment
- `/img/wafer_layout_map.png` - Wafer die layout

## Mathematical Expressions

Here's an inline equation: $E = mc^2$

And a block equation:

$$
\text{Resolution} = k_1 \frac{\lambda}{NA}
$$
